alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Pikes Peak above 11000 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued May 19 at 9:18PM MDT until May 21 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON FRIDAY TO 6 PM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 16 inches over Teller and northern El Paso County. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph before snow begins to fall, 20-25 mph wind gusts as the snow falls. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches over southern El Paso County. * WHERE...Teller County and northern El Paso County. * WHEN...From noon Friday to 6 PM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy, wet snow could cause damage to tree branches and power lines.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
